thread.title: 'Highly likely' Russia poisoned spy, says PM May

title: 'Highly likely' Russia poisoned spy, says PM May
text:
'Highly likely' Russia poisoned spy, says PM May Monday, March 12, 2018 - 02:03 
British Prime Minister Theresa May says there are only two ways a former spy, Sergei Skripal, was poisoned in the UK with a nerve agent known to be manufactured by Russia: Moscow was behind it, or they've lost control of their stockpile.   
British Prime Minister Theresa May says there are only two ways a former spy, Sergei Skripal, was poisoned in the UK with a nerve agent known to be manufactured by Russia: Moscow was behind it, or they've lost control of their stockpile.  //reut.rs/2p9QJbh
